com.riskgame.service.Impl

Class ConquestMapImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.riskgame.service.Impl.ConquestMapImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConquestMapInterface

    @Service
public class ConquestMapImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConquestMapInterface
    This is ConquestMapImpl which is service implementation which can read and write to/from conquest map file to playe riskgame.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Zankhanaben Patel
